data.name: RPG Maker MV - Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 5
data.detailed_description:
From a cute demon samurai and Ninja to fearless Shinsengumi-fighter and a worrior girl, we've got your leading lady's needs covered! Whether you're looking to switch up your party dynamic or simply wish for more variety, you can't go wrong with any of the 8 characters featured in this collection!

Fantasy Heroine Character Pack 5 makes it easier than ever to integrate a new female character into your project by offering matching walking sprites, front-view battlers, facesets, bust-up images and animated SV battlers.

Inspired by both classic fantasy elements and a modern manga aesthetic, the characters in this pack are a fantastic addition to your growing library of creative resources!

Features:
8 characters (Demon Samurai, Ninja, Shinsengumi fighter x 4, Tengu-miko, worrior) in 2 different outfits are in contents written below:
  • 8 walking sprites in 2 outfits＋1=17 walking sprites


  • Static 8 front-facing battlers x 13 variations in 2 outfits= 208＋Alternative versions for 4 characters(4x13)=total of 260 graphics!
  • 8 animated SV battlers in 2 outfits＋1=17
  • 8 facesets with 8 emotions in 2 outfits=128 graphics


  • 8 portrait bust images with 8 emotions in 2 outfits=128 graphics

BONUS:
All of 8 characters in 2 outfits with large-scale full-character artwork=16 graphics
